victims_database.title: Verified Victims of 2026 Iran Uprising
victims_database.purpose: Humanize statistics with real names and stories. Every number is a person.
victims_database.note: This is a SAMPLE structure. In production, would be populated from HRANA, Iran Human Rights, Hengaw reports.

victims.name: Negin Ghadimi
victims.circumstances: Shot during protests. Died in her father's arms after being struck by a bullet.

Her name was Negin. She was 28. She died in her father's arms while he watched helplessly. Remember her.
